comments: check all the xsl files in library and publishing, find a ALT attributes in to The reason for the title attribute is that in firefox the alt attribute is not supported for tooltips, only the title attribute is supported. In IE, both are supported.

the changed xsl files is not in right format. causing error while generating html page.

Please make sure you browse all element types to ensure your change works.

FATAL ERROR:  'Could not compile stylesheet'
